user_question: What are the most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far, and can you generate an image of one of them?
final_answer: The most Earth-like exoplanets include Kepler-452b, Proxima Centauri b, and TRAPPIST-1e. Image of Kepler-452b generated. Kepler-452b is located 1,400 light-years away in the constellation Cygnus. It is 60% larger than Earth and orbits its star in 385 days.
